mix_skill_choice_num:
You are required to select at least 1 skill to pass on.
Choose %ls Skills listed to pass along to the fused
monster. 1/2 of the parent skills allocated SP will be 
transferable to the fused result. Any transferred skills 
will go down by 1 point.
mix_skill_choice_nothing:
A skill must be chosen to continue. 
Please select a skill to assign.
